message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $70 is a bit low for me. I can meet you halfway, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $82, but I can do $87. That's the lowest I can go.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $87 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to do $84?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $88. That's the best I can do.
Hi Alice, I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to try to find a mutually beneficial price. Would you be willing to do $85?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to the end of the road. I can meet you at $86, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with $86. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $80 and $86, which would be $83. Can you do that?
